mapper.select: select partcode, partname, nickname, library, drw_no, remark from tbl_Part
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_part(partcode, partname, nickname, library, drw_no, drw_img, common, remark) values(seq_partcode.nextval, #{partname}, #{nickname}, #{library}, #{drw_no}, #{drw_img}, #{common}, #{remark})
